author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cognex Q4 Revenue Rose 39 Percent
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Cognex Corp:
* COGNEX REPORTS RECORD REVENUE, EARNINGS AND EPS FOR 2017 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 39 PERCENT * ‍REVENUE FOR Q1-18 IS EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN $165 MILLION AND $175 MILLION​
* ‍IN Q4-17, TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT OF 2017 RESULTED IN A ONE-TIME CHARGE TO TAX EXPENSE OF $83 MILLION, OR $0.46 PER SHARE​
* ‍GROSS MARGIN IS EXPECTED TO BE IN MID-70% RANGE FOR Q1-18​
* QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $‍0.16​ * QTRLY ‍REVENUE $180.4 MILLION VERSUS $129.3 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
